mapper.select: SELECT CORP_CODE AS corpCode, REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime, EQUALS AS equals, ETC AS etc FROM ATMS_SLA_60
SELECT CORP_CODE AS corpCode, REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime, EQUALS AS equals, ETC AS etc FROM ATMS_SLA_60 WHERE CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_60 WHERE CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}
INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_60 ( CORP_CODE, REG_DATETIME, EQUALS, ETC ) VALUES ( #{corpCode}, #{regDatetime}, #{equals}, #{etc} )
